question: I had a small stroke March 15. I have no problems with BP, cholesterol or diabetes. An echocardiogram of my heart showed it to be perfectly normal. I have minor weakness on my right arm and leg, but no pain, headaches or other symptoms.I often do not feel like eating, especially my former favorite foods and sometimes feel a slight queasiness.I am presently taking one Lipitor and one aspirin per day.This discussion is related to/posts/show/1040908.
title: Loss of appetite and queasiness
